        public Unit createUnit(java.lang.String name,
              int[] initialPosition,
              int weight,
              int agility,
              int strength,
              int toughness,
              boolean enableDefaultBehavior)
                throws ogp.framework.util.ModelException
        Description copied from interface: hillbillies.part1.facade.IFacade
        Create a new unit with the given attributes.
        Specified by:
        createUnit in interface hillbillies.part1.facade.IFacade
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the unit.
        initialPosition - The initial position of the unit, as an array with 3 elements {x, y, z}.
        weight - The initial weight of the unit
        agility - The initial agility of the unit
        strength - The initial strength of the unit
        toughness - The initial toughness of the unit
        enableDefaultBehavior - Whether the default behavior of the unit is enabled
        Throws:
        ogp.framework.util.ModelException - [CAN] A precondition was violated or an exception was thrown.
